attributes.action: STOP BULLYING AND SHUT DOWN ASK.FM
attributes.additional_details:
I am starting this petition on behalf on my dear friend Izzy who took her life early this week due to bullying in school and on an online website called 'ask.fm'.

We need to put a stop to this because to many young people are ending their lives over bullying.

rejection.details: The existing e-petition is on the home page, under Department for Culture, Media & Sport.
